title: (x) Script.aculo.us script - Snell Roundhand {Jan E}
content:
A friend asked me to ID this face for him, but i’m pretty hopeless when it comes to scripts as i hardly ever use them. Looks familiar though but i just can’t seem to put my finger on it…  
Your help is very much appreciated, many thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201184026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scriptIDplease_5710.png)

 [‹ (x) Island Choppers decal - Hairpin {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201184026/http:/typophile.com/node/35984 "Go to previous forum topic") [It's a girl thing / precious font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201184026/http:/typophile.com/node/35855 "Go to next forum topic")
author: franzheidl
